# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $125. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate. I trust you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
